description: Appends specified content to a file.

args.name: workingDirectory
args.description: The absolute path to the current working directory (e.g., project or repository root).

args.name: filePath
args.description: The relative path of the file to append to.

args.name: content
args.description: The content to append to the file.

args.name: addNewline
args.description: Optional. Whether to add a newline character after the appended content. Defaults to true.
